Introduction¶

Background¶

From the Gorilla team a question came to solve some of the problems they had. Major issues were -Syncing with the main Edudex repository had to be done manually -Several scripts for these syncs were built and were without maintenance -Overview was lost and an incident way of working claimed much organisational resources

Project description¶

An Ibis was built to demonstrate how this kind of a problem is solved.
